summary: I'm Do Dinh Anh, a web developer with 2 years of experience in Javascript technologies (which includes 1 year of experience of .NET development). Currently, I'm responsible for carrying out front-end design of almost projects at work. Besides that, learning new languages and technologies is what I am keen on (I self-taught ReactJS with 2 weeks). In my spare time, I prefer reading books as well. My favorite books are: Clean Code, Secrets of the Javascript Ninja and You don't know JS.

skills.name: Programming Languages
values: ASP.NET MVC, Web API, Entity Framework
